Reviews.Title: Not really an unlocked phone!
Reviews.Author: Baljit S Gambhir
Reviews.Content: I bought this so called unlocked phone as I wanted to be able to use it with SIM cards purchased in different countries.  The phone I received had a TMobile logo which made me suspicious as to whether the phone was really unlocked.  My suspicions came out to be true.  I used this phone with SIM cards from UK, Holland, and India.  The phone feature worked with no issues, however, having the internet and data services to work was a nightmare and wasted a lot of time.  In each country I had to go the service supplier in the country and have them adjust the settings.  In UK one of the service suppliers was never able to make the phone work for data services.  Every now and then the TMobile applications shows up interfering with the use.  The product is not what it says and claims it to be.  It seems that the phone was a "TMobile" phone subsequently unlocked by the seller or somebody else.  Although I was able to get a discount from Amazon (related to accessory package being damaged) which I appreciated very much but overall I am extremely disappointed and would soon be exploring return of the phone.  If you are looking for the TRUE unlocked feature do NOT buy this phone.  If the phone comes with logo of any service provider like "TMobile" in my case simply return it to be on the safe side.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone great price
Reviews.Author: Raj N
Reviews.Content: I must say this is a great phone as I expected, I received it in a T mobile box and unlocked.I purchased this from Flux Electronics, very courteous service.Surely recommend this. Its a great item and has all the features as described.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Andy Philip "Trini Christian"
Reviews.Content: Firstly, this HTc has fantastic features. I was contemplating buying the nokia N8 since it has a lot of features. Then I checked out this baby. If you're looking for a good smartphone, this is a smart choice. Few things to note though, like most smartphones, the battery time sucks, and the volume on the phone is not very loud

Reviews.Title: WORST CELL PHONE EVER, SELLER IS TO BLAME
Reviews.Author: Sedgwick Iyasere
Reviews.Content: I order the product and I never received it on time, say about a month of wait. Then I received the product and the phone can't turn on, a defective product. I asked the seller to give a discount to fix the problem but he refuse , he also refuse to pay for return shipping cost to ship back the item to him. I will not recommend this seller to any person. I was able to turn the phone on with a new battery but the phone automatically turns off and can't be recharge until you take the battery out and charge it with a universal charger. I am waiting for the sell to pay for shipping cost so I can return this item. I can pay for a phone for $162.00 and I am having a problem using it.Why no voting buttons? We don't let customers vote on their own reviews, so the voting buttons appear

Reviews.Title: the wosrt purchase
Reviews.Author: Alexander Rosario
Reviews.Content: in all my purchase work instead of amazon, this has been the worst cell I received damaged, the camera does not work, the button to raise and lower the volume did not have it, had the damaged battery, I recommend not to buy anything from this supplied

Reviews.Title: HTC - Hard To Comprehend
Reviews.Author: Dewayne A. Robey
Reviews.Content: My first HTC phone was an HTC Touch Pro and I loved that phone! I recently wanted to ditch an iPhone that was given to me for this phone. I researched HTC phones and the Sensation was reasonably priced and had the features I needed, so I ordered it....along with an extra battery, because I'm a tech who is usually away from a power outlet for extended amounts of time and I read reviews that suggested doing so. I even got a charging dock for work.I'll admit it, I was VERY ready to rid myself of the ridiculous iPhone. After a month of having the HTC Sensation, I found that I'd jumped from the frying pan, into the fire. I have to keep this phone charging, because the batteries do not last half a day (with moderate use and with more than half of the services and apps stopped). Even with charging for four hours, there is less than half of the battery life left. I don't understand this! I have left my iPhone in my bag, on standby, for a week and still had 20% of the battery life left...with all services running in the background.Second, it takes an entire FIVE MINUTES for this phone to boot-up and/or reboot. When I'm working with a client and the phone reboots for no particular reason, it is annoying to have to wait FIVE MINUTES for to make a call or check e-mail.Oh, and forget wi-fi. I can't turn a corner at the gym or I lose the wi-fi signal, while the horrible iPhone could hold a wi-fi signal all the way to my car in the gym's parking lot.On a "nit-picky" note, there is no notepad application resident on the Android Gingerbread OS and that is annoying. I shouldn't have to install a 3rd party application, when other OS's come with this standard. Ridiculous!I actually made a mistake, because I thought I was ordering a Sensation that was not affiliated with paticular carrier, but it came with a T-Mobile stamp on it.Oh, and lastly, don't even mention Ice Cream Sandwich...it's almost June and it was rumored to be slated for April.I like my phone, but I'll probably never love it!

Reviews.Title: Impressive phone but cant get to work on at&t; network
Reviews.Author: Hiker "Hiker"
Reviews.Content: impressive phone.  I bought for a month long trip to New Zealand and it worked great.  Bought a sim card in airport for 2 gigs for $40 us dollars.  Used skype and it as a hotspot for 4 other devices at times.  The guy at the vodafone store did like 5 different things to settings to get to work so it is not very simple to know how to set up.  this works in the states on the T-mobile network but I have not been able to get it to work on at&t; network.  Not sure why a real bummer as I just wanted a 1 time sim card data and t mobile is monthly charge.  camera and several workings and feeling of phone surpassed my Motorola Bionic.  Camera better than bionic too.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone, had to return
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I received the phone apparently new and in perfect condition. Started using the phone right away, having read the reviews i knew it could die in less than two weeks, luckly i planned the purchase in advance, after 12 days the phone just stopped having any signal anywhere, also since the beginning the battery wouldn't last even a day on total standby, in other reviews i have read that after several exchanges they got good phones that continued to work, and with batteries that lasted up to 3 days so if you have the time and patience to return the phone 2 or 3 times you might get a good one as i have read, but if you don't take this in consideration you will waste your time and money and end up with a faulty cellphone.

Reviews.Title: Without Doubt Smart Phone in the World.
Reviews.Author: COSOSHY
Reviews.Content: I bougth this phone two months ago.I travelled to Dubai and Africa(Nigeria)this amazing phone work great in both countries without doubt.....I was on skype all nigth in Dubai on (WIFI) and also in Nigeria even in my Home town why network jacked up sometime.I didn't belivered will works.This is a great phone,the pictures and video is amazing.I don't have any comment atall.Good Job HTC Comp.

Reviews.Title: First smartphone
Reviews.Author: Russ Gooberman
Reviews.Content: I'm a late comer to the smartphone parade - (or the 21st century, depending on your perspective), but I was intent on buying an Android phone, and this one fit the bill.  It's a sleek, responsive, high utility phone, and because of its unlocked nature, I was able to get a very good deal with Simple Mobile, getting unlimited talk, text, and web access (3G) for $40 a month.  Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: not that great a phone
Reviews.Author: vjshanky
Reviews.Content: This was my 3rd android phone and its screen was gorgeous but phones performance was lackluster. It slowed down after few days of use (same story with all my android phones). Also Camera sucks. All pics come up with a reddish tinge. I tried changing all settings but nothing helped. if you want a android phone, better buy Google nexus line. Bloatware and crap from other vendors slows down android phone to a point where it is not a smooth experience. Now i switched to Iphone and is waiting for the time when Google will release a nexus phone with an awesome camera. Maybe Nexus 6 will be the ONE!

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: mally
Reviews.Content: After 3 months , it turn off and never turn on again , had to sent back, apparently they repaired at not cost and guest what?? only last 6 months , again sent back and going through the inconvenience of being without phone for 2 weeks, still have it but I don't feel safe anymore. Battery life sucks I have to carry my charge wherever I go, so definitively don't recommend.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed!
Reviews.Author: drdale
Reviews.Content: I ordered an unlocked.  When it finally arrived, the phone was locked.  It took a number of days to get it unlocked and when the phone was finally "functional", the receiving capabilities was horrible.  I even went to an additional expense of purchasing a cell phone signal booster antenna which did in fact help the other phones in our house but the HTC phone was still abyssmal,  The battery life if very low as well.  I have contacted Amazon to help me get a refund on this phone.  My expectations with this phone were very high.  Sad to say, reality was very low.

Reviews.Title: Worst experience of my life
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: HTC has the worst warranty system I have ever come across. My first HTC Sensation came with a defective screen; I was able to exchange it the next day. Second one had the same problem! After 3 warranty cycles without solving the problem, I finally received a "refurbished" phone which was in worse cosmetic condition than the one I sent them. Also, it has a problematic connection somewhere on the mainboard (intermittent shutdown & frozen applications)! This problem manifested from day 1.  Now HTC warranty is refusing to fix this dysfunctional phone they sent me, alleging "abuse". It's been over one year, and 6 warranty applications, and I still have a malfunctioning phone. I can't believe this kind of treatment still occurs in todays marketplace.

Reviews.Title: Good but not perfect
Reviews.Author: nguyen tran
Reviews.Content: I previously used Samsung Omnia 7 and Nokia phones. I've used this phone for two months and it has pros and cons.Pros:Good design with partial back coverFast4.3" screen but the phone is not larger than my 4" Samsung Omnia 7Has many useful applicationGood speaker and audio reproduction (way better than my Samsung Omnia 7Cons:Heavy. This phone is significantly heavier than my Samsung Omnia 7Not very stable OS (Tmobile recommneds that I should restart my phone at least once a week)Screen is not as bright and beautiful as my Samsung Omnia 7Battery life is below average (with light usage (no 3g or 4g, only wifi occasionally), I still have to charge my phone once every two days)It's hard to remove the back cover, especially if you have short finger nail.No GPS without internet.Camera is not as good as my Samsung Omnia 7, even though the Sensation has newer camera. Camera performance is just average.Overall, if you're an Android fan (you want to customize your phone in 10,000 ways), you'll like this device. If not, I recommend Windows 7 or Iphone OS.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: AG2000
Reviews.Content: I must say this is an excellent phone, I have been using it for over two weeks now and I am happy with all the features. I simply loved TV-out,SNS integration,Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Google Talk, Picasa integration.This phone has really made my life easier and organized. Also, Document viewer, organizer, voice memo/dials/commands are commendable features of this phone.Android OS with Dual-core 1.2 GHz Scorpion CPU makes it simply awesome.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Churuda
Reviews.Content: It is an amazing phone, the 4g is wonderfully fast, graphics, pictures and screen are great, but if you dont have an internet plan or access to wifi 24/7 the phone losses 80% of its use cause most of the apps need internet conection.I completelly love it though.

Reviews.Title: HTC Sensation Z710E 4G
Reviews.Author: Nafiz Erdogan
Reviews.Content: Cargo was shipped on time. Original & unlocked GSM phone and works on Turkey without any trouble. Product & screen performance is better than I expect. 8GB external micro SD is a bonus for phone storage. Sense interface is very useful. External speakers are not enough for crowd places. especially I suggest Sensation for internet related services.

Reviews.Title: Great phone but poor battery
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: I used an A9191 and loved it. However, the battery life was very short. For some reason, including a customer review, I thought and believed the battery on this phone will do better; I was wrong. If you're willing to only use the internet when you're able to charge the phone, then you may go for this phone, otherwise, try something else

Reviews.Title: BEWARE!!! OVERHEATING ISSUES
Reviews.Author: Isaac Saboohi "Sabooman"
Reviews.Content: Buy this phone if you live in a cold climate and want a personal heater.My phone was sitting in standby, when I picked it up it was so hot that I couldn't hold it in my hand. I tried turning it on but it was completely fried.I then did some research and found out that this is an issue that is widespread with the HTC Sensation.Called Tmobile, they are going to send a replacement phone but they have no idea when the issue will be addressed by HTC.They said that HTC is aware of the problem but has not addressed it yet, there is supposed to be a firmware update.If you ask me, this is a class action lawsuit waiting to happen. HTC should step up, recall and fix the issue immediately, instead they are playing a hide and seek.This issue could have ended up far worse if the battery got even hotter and caused a fire, which is definitely plausible.STAY AWAY FROM THIS PHONE FOR THE TIME BEING.

Reviews.Title: resonable
Reviews.Author: Mic Silviu Lucian
Reviews.Content: The phone was in good quality but it didn't look new to me. More like refurbished, plus it came locked. Luckly after few emails the GagetWorld kindly sent me a unlocking code and the phone works fine now plus i got a case and a car charger. Good Deal for an HTC Sensation.

Reviews.Title: stoped working and from tiwan not china
Reviews.Author: trisha
Reviews.Content: Stoped working after two days of having phone but while it did work it was amazing. But not that grear

Reviews.Title: REGRET!!!
Reviews.Author: Desene Browne
Reviews.Content: After searching and searching, i finally settled on this phone. What a regret!!! It keeps turning off/blanking out ( then you have to take out the battery, which the phone is hard to open because of the stupid design), when you go on Google and stay long and come off it has to load every time before you can go to another app on the phone and It gets very hot at times especially when the battery is low. In addition to that it sticks a lot, which is annoying when chatting on whatsapp etc or you want to make a phone call.  I would say buy a different phone.

Reviews.Title: Ordered two, both were defective, got one replaced, was bad too, returned them all
Reviews.Author: JUAN ANTONIO ISLAS MUNOZ
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these from two different sellers to replace our old Samsung Exhibits. The first one came and worked well but the speaker was bad, producing a lot of distortion even with ring tones. The second one came but had a bad microphone, so people on the other side could not hear me. I had that one replaced and the new one had issues starting and would struggle to come  back from sleep mode (I had to press the button several times while in the other phones, I only had to do it once).Dissapointing. I really liked the phone. I find it weird that I got three bad ones.

Reviews.Title: A lot of issues found in phone
Reviews.Author: Raj Kumar Mogili "Raj Kumar"
Reviews.Content: I woul like to inform you that HTC Sensation Z710E Unlocked GSM Android Smartphone  is not goo to prefer any more.Iam facing a lot of issues withphone like HTC Synch is working ad suddenly automaticall goes with old date calende 1970 default dates , lot of heat generating t the time of charging. not able to take backup data,unabel to upgrade withlatst andriodversions,Major issus touch screen is not all working frm left most vertical side (Col) almost 25 % areais not working would like to return the phone.Please help me in this regard.

Reviews.Title: great features, bad reception
Reviews.Author: Joshua Haddad
Reviews.Content: Great phone but poor reception makes phone basically useless. Stay away! Phone has great features but the bad antenna ruined it.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: John Bolaños
Reviews.Content: Why did you choose this rating?R / I chose this rate because I successfully fulfilled SupplierWhat do you like or dislike?R / So far I've enjoyed buying the product, I had no problemWho would you recommend this product?R / I've recommended it to friends and family

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: OmmO
Reviews.Content: Great working android, unlocked phone with all working aplications. no isuess what so ever. great deal very pleased. would like to recommend this product to everybody. many thanks

Reviews.Title: TMobile?
Reviews.Author: CristalCee
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews but i still have a question, is this phone able to work with a tmobile sim card?

Reviews.Title: No Regrets
Reviews.Author: taliamarilyn
Reviews.Content: As a former Blackberry user, I had absolutely no idea which type of Android phone I was going to pick. Everyone usually goes for either the Nexus or one of the Galaxys, but honestly I'm not into spending hundreds of dollars on a phone. After hours of research, I am very happy that I decided to go with the HTC Sensation. The screen resolution is great and the phone moves very fast (and I'm not just saying that). I was happy to see that they included a 8GB memory stick, because if you did enough research you would see that the phone doesn't come with much internal memory.In regards to the downsides of the phone, it's quite big and therefore it can't exactly fit in your pocket. Also, I find that the speakers in the phone aren't very loud. And last but not least, from the moment that I opened the phone the Twitter application kept on crashing. It has never crashed while I was actually using it, however, so it doesn't really bother me.Overall, the downsides are so minimal that it's impossible not to love this phone. My boyfriend has a Nexus and is jealous that I have it because he claims that it's better. Can you imagine? Quality, and for a good price too! This phone is definitely a bargain. I couldn't be any happier with my decision to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Phone is running good.
Reviews.Author: satya
Reviews.Content: The phone was in excellent condition bodywise. No scratches whatsoever the phone didn't ship unlocked by default, i had to get it unlocked by myself. But they paid for the unlocking so it's all good. As i started using the phone, after downloading apps and some games, i noticed that phone is functioning slow. The app loading time is high, and multitasking experience is not so smooth. I have used android devices with less powerful processors... but compared to them, this phone is slower. All in all, I rate the phone as functioning perfectly, just a little slow. The condition is extremely good. So i give 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Helen Garvin
Reviews.Content: I BROUGHT THIS FOR BY BROTHER AND AND HE REALLY LOVES IT.IT WORKS GOOD AND THE FEATURES ARE MANY HE HAS NO COMPLAIN

Reviews.Title: Mermorial Problem
Reviews.Author: Mohikan
Reviews.Content: HelloI bought this cell phone some months ago. I checked my internal memory and normally it should be 4 gb. But only 1.1 gb I saw it. I checked several times but it didn't change it. They put 8 gb external memory card but they written on the web-page internal memory 4 gb not 1 gb.It is really bad new for me due to I ordered it for my children. Please next time when you can write something, to be careful about it.Best regards,

Reviews.Title: Best phone I ever had
Reviews.Author: J.A.
Reviews.Content: When my last HTC broke, I sought another one of their phones. I intended to buy the HTC Sensation XL, but my partner convinced me this is a great alternative. I am very happy I bought this phone. The body is sleek, and feels good in the hand. The rounded body can be semi-slippery to hold. The screen is large and bright. The screen width allows easy typing vertical or horizontal. The camera is clear and sharp. It is hard to clean the camera lens without taking the shell off. The scariest thing about this phone is taking the shell off to reach the battery compartment. Certain guts of the phone are exposed by this process, so be extremely careful! I love the battery life on my phone. Depending on data/Wi-fi usage, this can vary between 1-3 days. Keep in mind I rooted my phone and use third party batteries on it. It is very snappy, handling everything I ask of it. On vacation, I had no problem using it on the T-Mobile Netherlands network. I recommend buying this phone!

Reviews.Title: My second purchase
Reviews.Author: Nelson Meschke da Rocha
Reviews.Content: My second purchase with this seller, fast delivery and product as advertised. I'm still learning the new features available.The HDMI out seems to be the big differential with respect to my previous HTC.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, but you need more information.
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: To start things off, I love this phone, it is great, fast, and more than I had hoped for. However, unless you are on T Mobile, don't get the phone unless you plan on rooting it because it will not connect to your data plan otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: ADRIAN JOSE CARRENO GONZALEZ
Reviews.Content: Excelente... el producto llego en perfecto estado y navega muy rapido... las imagenes buenas, los graficos tambien, es muy buen equipo. lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Great phone! Great service from wolrdwide distributors!
Reviews.Author: huge
Reviews.Content: Great phone! Great service from worldwide distributors! The phone is even better than I thought (HTC Sensation 4G). The service from Worldwide Distributors was great. I received the phone much sooner than I expected. When I called them for help with one issue they were extremely helpful.Would definitely buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Gold Standard
Reviews.Author: Kinzy
Reviews.Content: MY purchase was all I could ask for and expect. Speed, great packaging , and order follow up.I look forward to future purchases.Thanks Amazon

Reviews.Title: Best Phone EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "MIT"
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest phone i have ever gotten. It came in a t-mobile box, but it was unlocked. I popped in my AT&T; sim, and was on my. I love this phone, and believe it is the best on the market. The screen is gorgeous.I would recommend this phone to anyone who is in the market for a new phone.P.S. The box might have 1 of the seals broken, and the plastic on the phone will not be perfectly placed, but that is because they needed to put in the unlock pin.

Reviews.Title: B.R. Patel
Reviews.Author: Bhupendra R. Patel
Reviews.Content: This phone looked great in the case, This was Christmas gift to my nephew in India, He used this phone for a month and then..... died. He has to seek help from technical support locally. Even though this phone was SOLD under International Warranty it was NOT honored at factory repair place. He ended up spending his own money to get it repair. Shall I get refund of the repair charges? I asked my nephew to send me a copy for the repair bill. Amazon should you do business with seller like this? If yes, then I need to go some where else to do my business. Let's see how you respond this.

Reviews.Title: It's amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: Majedeast
Reviews.Content: The Device has a great specification and fantastic fit with the Android systemBut the problem of the speaker is too weakBut I loved the device

Reviews.Title: Great phone , Decent service.
Reviews.Author: Abdulmohsen Bai "AmGari"
Reviews.Content: I ordered two phones, first one received unlocked. After communicating with the company, they sent me the unlock code. The second one received unlocked but received phone with no screen plastic cover and plastic case, which makes it look used. Other than that the phone working great.

Reviews.Title: A very bad Cell phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Resay
Reviews.Content: I just got that cell phone last week, and it was the worst experience ever!! the phone was not working at all. It wasn't receiving/ making calls although the network was perfect. The Gps was not working, and always gives me wrong locations all the time. the ringing volume is too low. i can hardly hear it ring while i hold it in my hand!!! its data connection is very bad, even through a wireless connection(WiFi). i tried all recommendation in the internet forums and i got nowhere. i wouldn't recommend that phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: good seller
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my brother in Nigeria and it work perfect.so would recommend it for anybody to use good product.

Reviews.Title: Thank your HTC
Reviews.Author: Ye Li
Reviews.Content: I get the phone today.My English is poor.But I fell this phone is great. this is my first phone after I came US.

Reviews.Title: htc sensation phone
Reviews.Author: Phani
Reviews.Content: I have ordered this phone, did not get the phone in time, and after 10 days I got a mail from Amazon saying they are refunding my money back , but I was not informed the reason. I was totally disappointed with this as I was looking for this and want to gift the phone to my Brother :(

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Ultra-fast 4G-enabled, Android 2.2-powered smartphone with 4.3-inch qHD touchscreen display and dual-core 1.2 GHz processor
Wireless-N Wi-Fi networking with mobile hotspot sharing with up to 8 devices plus Wi-Fi Calling capabilities
8-MP camera, HD 1080p video capture, Bluetooth 3.0, 4 GB internal memory,
Up to 6.7 hours of talk time, up to 400 hours (16.7 days) of standby time; released in June, 2011
8-MP camera; HD 1080p video capture; Bluetooth 3.0; 4 GB internal memory; DLNA capabilities; web browser with Flash 10.1
DLNA capabilities, web browser with Flash 10.1
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
ProductInfo.Name: HTC Sensation Z710E Unlocked GSM Android Smartphone with Wi-Fi, GPS and 8 MP Camera - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Black
